pkgmetadata.longdescription: Enable Cross-Study Analysis of 'CDISC' 'SEND' Datasets // A system enables cross study Analysis by extracting and filtering study data for control animals from 'CDISC' 'SEND' Study Repository. These data types are supported: Body Weights, Laboratory test results and Microscopic findings. These database types are supported: 'SQLite' and 'Oracle'.
